title: Games where you do your absolute best... and still lose.... :(
body:
i ended the game 10/5/14 as nautilus jungle... YEAH...... but once the feeding starts in silver it doesn't stop. 

fiora didn't speak english and died 16 times in a 36 minute game against an illaoi even when i gave her lane support, after a while i tried snowballing the mid  and bot... but apparently no one knows how to play vs a zilean.... their jungle tryn just farmed jungle until lvl 13 and then startedsplitpushing, then when he got 4 items he went from 0/2/3 to 10/2/5

/rant

anyone else have games where they just do all they can and it is completely hopeless?
